Entry.Name: Series Title
Entry.Definition: The final name of a "group" of episodes to which the programme belongs. These episodes have a shared identification and branding and are linked by common characters, subject matter, style or story.
Entry.DefiningDocument: AMWA Application Specification AS-11 MXF Program Contribution

Entry.Name: Programme Title
Entry.Definition: The final name of the programme used to identify it as a version of an episode. This name indicates the specific purpose for which the version was created.
Entry.DefiningDocument: AMWA Application Specification AS-11 MXF Program Contribution

Entry.Name: Episode Title/Episode No.
Entry.Definition: The final name of the programme used to identify it as an editorially distinct member of a series i.e. an episode. This name may include a number (or consist only of a number) indicating the position of the episode within the series.
Entry.DefiningDocument: AMWA Application Specification AS-11 MXF Program Contribution

Entry.Name: Shim Name
Entry.Definition: The name of the AS-11 shim specification to which the MXF file conforms.
Entry.DefiningDocument: AMWA Application Specification AS-11 MXF Program Contribution

Entry.Name: Shim Version
Entry.Definition: The version of the AS-11 shim specification to which the MXF file conforms.
Entry.DefiningDocument: AMWA Application Specification AS-11 MXF Program Contribution

Entry.Name: Audio Track Layout
Entry.Definition: A code to identify the scheme that describes the usage of the audio channels encoded in the file.
Entry.DefiningDocument: AMWA Application Specification AS-11 MXF Program Contribution

Entry.Name: Primary Audio Language
Entry.Definition: A code to identify the main language used on primary audio channels.
Entry.DefiningDocument: AMWA Application Specification AS-11 MXF Program Contribution

Entry.Name: Closed Captions Present
Entry.Definition: A flag to indicate whether the programme contains embedded (out of vision) subtitling information.
Entry.DefiningDocument: AMWA Application Specification AS-11 MXF Program Contribution

Entry.Name: Closed Captions Type
Entry.Definition: A code to identify the editorial description of the closed captions.
Entry.DefiningDocument: AMWA Application Specification AS-11 MXF Program Contribution

Entry.Name: Closed Captions Language
Entry.Definition: A code to identify the main language used in the closed captions.
Entry.DefiningDocument: AMWA Application Specification AS-11 MXF Program Contribution
